about_the_game:
The quirkiest hidden object game Search & Find - Hidden Objects is here so join in on the fun!

With an online community of over 250,000 puzzle enthusiasts and beautifully detailed, hand-illustrated pictures by published puzzle artist Adam Doyle, Search and Find - Hidden Objects serves a relaxing adventure for everyone ready to perfect their spotting skills.

PICTURES WITH A THOUSAND STORIES
Search & Find - Hidden Objects features illustrations from Adam Doyle that tell a thousand stories, making the experience different for everyone. You’ll travel the world and explore themes, such as a lantern festival or even a very English celebration, as you search and find hidden objects. Wait, is that Elvis hiding in the park?

RELAXING AND UNLIMITED HIDDEN OBJECT GAMEPLAY
Identify what object you need to find, use your keyboard or mouse to move around the picture to explore in detail, point and click on the object to select it. You have unlimited tries so take your time to take in the scenes.

FUN & REWARDS FOR EVERYONE
Customise your screen, unlock new tools and just dive into the hand-illustrated world filled with quirky details.

LOVE ANIMALS? WE GOT YOU!!
For doggy aficionados, we have hot dogs, we have cool dogs. From mysterious cats to cute squirrels, can you spot the hiding furbaby?

name: Search & Find - Hidden Objects

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: With beautifully detailed, hand-illustrated pictures by published puzzle artist Adam Doyle, Search and Find - Hidden Objects serves a relaxing adventure for everyone ready to perfect their spotting skills.
